thread.section_title: The Bay City Tribune - online features/money and finance
thread.title: What Health Care Really Costs

author: NewsUSA@NewsUSA.com (NewsUSA)
title: What Health Care Really Costs
text: What Health Care Really Costs Posted: Tuesday, July 21, 2015 9:32   Wed Jul 22, 2015. What Health Care Really Costs   Unexpected medical costs and a lack of health care coverage can have an adverse impact on an employee's personal finances and quality of life. In fact, unpaid medical bills are the number one cause of personal bankruptcy. Voluntary policies work with major medical insurance to help provide financial protection by paying cash benefits to help cover medical fees or other everyday costs such as a mortgage or monthly utility bills. For more information, visit www.aflac.com .
